name: suzette scarf
notes:
learn how to crochet this gorgeous suzette stitch scarf in under 3 hours! using chunky yarn and a large hook, i'll teach you step by step how to crochet this simple scarf 

you can use any yarn and hook you would like, below is what i used for my scarf. 

yarn: chunky (scheepjes namaste) 

hook size(s): 9mm 

i used 3 x balls of scheepjes namaste yarn with a 9mm hook 

the weight and drape of the yarn make it quite stretchy and hard to measure but my personal scarf is approximately 6 inches (15cm) wide and 87 inches (220cm) long.
